snippet: By becoming the first candidate to officially enter the presidential race, the Texas senator hopes to reclaim the attention of those in the G.O.P.’s right wing.
abstract: Sen Ted Cruz is set to announce in formal speech at Liberty University that he is officially seeking Republican nomination in 2016 presidential election; decision to declare himself officially is calculated to catapult his candidacy to forefront, even as conservatives may have begun considering other possible candidates.

byline.original: By JONATHAN MARTIN and MAGGIE HABERMAN

lead_paragraph: By becoming the first candidate to officially enter the presidential race, the Texas senator hopes to reclaim the attention of those in the G.O.P.’s right wing.

headline.main: Ted Cruz Hopes Early Campaign Entry Will Focus Voters’ Attention
headline.print_headline: Republican Hopes Early Campaign Entry Will Focus Voters’ Attention
